name: deimosrising
text: Is this the genesis of Prime Time Records? I wonder.

name: idsyen
text: I think this is a fictionalized account of the origins of the Wu-Tang clan. It is clear that, in this analogy, Ray is the RZA and Beef is the GZA. I say this because of the GZA's well-known trip to the moon around that time. If you don't believe me, check the liner notes to Rubber Soul.

name: wonelove
text:
chubby for the liner notes reference because I actually had forgotten that...

but then I suddenly remembered Lie Bot

name: tasteful
text: i chubbied you but then i realized beef is definitely the RZA and ray is maybe the GZA although ghostface or method seems more his part

name: anticitizen
text: Todd is Big Baby Jesus.

name: greenkoolayd
text: fuck yeah, dude!

name: beldilettante
text: chubbied for descloux

name: catachresis
text: There are not enough raps about what it would be like to have eye problems.

name: riazm
text: What rhymes with myopic? Topic? Chronic? hmm maybe there's a rhyme here about...treating glaucoma with marijuana? Only glaucoma is different to short sightedness so I don't know. I'm just thinking out loud here man, if we want to see more raps about eye problems we're going to have to create them ourselves.

name: saurkraus
text: When in doubt, just rhyme the word with the exact same word .

name: boredom_man
text: Especially if that word is "am" or "me."

name: molesticide
text:
or if you are talib kweli.

what? i fucking don't like him. also it rhymed to say that.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Or "coelacanth".

name: history
text:
To prove saurkraus' point:
From one of the greatest rap albums of all time...ahem..

"Don't let me slip,
because if I slip,
then I'm slippin'"

name: fineoakstructure
text: there's a reason why he's really more of a producer.

name: ttagxamm
text:
i got astigmatism like protestants got schism
corneas harder than hardknocks shootin up blocks with glocks
bullets fall in cataracts, gunsmoke clouding my iris,
counteract attacks with the third eye of osiris
even blinded with glaucomas i leave my foes in comas

name: catachresis
text: Chubbies go ^here, guys.

name: ttagxamm
text:
like Tiresias I'm epic, prophetic, cut you to pieces
I'll pull your leg over your eyes, it's catachresis,
peep this: I'm metamorphosin',
leave you cry-iyi-yin'
like Roy Orbison, don't get morbid, son
you'll get done: I spit wicked braille
but y'all frail, you fail
to impress, I'm the pinball wizard
you're the least of the less,
you're a rhyme shirker, I'm the Miracle Worker
teachin Helen Keller to talk to Teller
while you fallin through the cellar
into Hell, sir
allow me to introduce myself I'm the man without fear,
you get speared, your roof gets teared,
I'm just sayin, on the level
meanwhile I'm playin truth or dare with the devil

name: ovenface
text: I like that I am learning about mythology because I looked up a word I found in a rap about eye problems.

name: laserblade
text: Chubbied for the Oedipus Rex reference.

name: gouldgonewild
text: This is a little Doctor Octagon ish

name: ted0phile
text:
You're just saying that because it mentions health problems.

Alas! Not even one occurrence of 'rectum' or 'doo-doo'.

name: mercuri0us
text: A masterpiece.  Must be the first rap ever to reference the Who and Roy Orbison.

name: saint
text:
Be careful. Eminem may very well be thiefering this for his next album.

Shameless hobo.

name: libelandslander
text: I really, really wish I could give an extra chubby for the reformation reference.

name: ttagxamm
text:
Thanks for your indulgence, but don't worry about it:

Stab me with nails I got optical prostheses
My sonar never fails, I'm like chiropteran species
You wanna slander me? In all candor, G
that's specious
I drop more science than Mary Eddy teaches
and I got more props already than Luther got Theses

name: slalvation
text: Biopic?

name: ttagxamm
text:
myopic optics can't stop this
can't knock me down i'm gyroscopic
i roll thick and rock headknots
ancient like Coptic break you open like lockpicks
twist you up in double helix like Watson & Crick
turn your life inside out like endoscopic bio pics
clock tick tick tock ticks to six-six-six
your own personal End Times' now, apocalyptic

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I look forward to this saga continuing.

name: ttagxamm
text:
readin eye chart flows and stoppin hearts cold
like king midas's hex all I see turns to gold
I'm Optometrist Rex, I vex
synapses
the opposition collapses when i move the masses
shakin asses and makin passes at all the girls who wear glasses

name: aelindil
text: I... I think I'm in love.

name: froggle
text: I like how the chubbies get fewer and fewer with each new rap... Not that they aren't badass as ray's thong. Chubbies for all!

name: hurry
text: Well, you can only give so many chubbies per page.. =(

name: ttagxamm
text:
drunk on bourbon whiskey,
it's disturbin and risky
how you try and dis me
you don't wanna
i'm quick like katana, slick like satana
aka satan it's fate son
here's a lesson:
you try and teach me
you'll never reach me
blind swordsman zatoichi

name: mulisha7
text: Hell of chubbied for the Zatoichi reference. You can't have a rap about ocular problems without bringing in the blind master swordsman

name: dismas
text:
I can't give any more chubbies on this page

but your flow gives me multiple boners.

name: shinkusan
text: It's interesting that this comic only has 56 comments. And that 5 or 7 of these comments are some of the BEST COMMENTS EVER WRITTEN.

name: wozzeck
text: I do not recall Cudgel crossing paths with a rapping gid.

name: dicklaurent
text: There is a song about Glaucoma , but it's not a rap.

name: geysershitdick
text: Modern Rap needs a voice like Doggz 2 Tha Bizzone right now.

name: tetrisattack
text: What's a rap company? Some sort of work place where there are a bunch of people in cubicles just writing raps? Because if these places do exists, I know where I want to work.

name: m3funkyb
text: Gettin' ill on logistics, shootin out a window, holdin' a little endo, I got an eye infection, it's like zombie ressurection, but I ain't gonna trip, I won't take a hit, from myself, on the face, for my mistake WORD

name: pbeez
text: I don't thik this strip gets enough love. It's one of the rare times Ray gets vulnerable (that and meeting his dad) and both times it's never schmaltzy.

name: cdl146
text: Alt text: they just had a lot of bad-ass raps, basically. They were fucking good!

name: evolume
text: I have superior oblique myokymia.  if you check Wikipedia, you'll see that I wrote much of the article on it as well.

name: honesttom
text: Dammit, nothing rhymes with that.

name: ttagxamm
text:
And yet:

you fear your fate
so bleak
your time's up:
superior
oblique
myokymia

my vision shimmers, my rage simmers
my eyes twitch, still I flip the switch
now your future's gettin dimmer
I'm burning pitch, invisible witch,
fantastitch plastitch elastitch,
which means I stretch slimmer
you wanna start a thing?
Fuck you, I'm Ben Grimmer

[No, I don't know how the Fantastic Four got in there]

name: invidious
text: This is the first time all of my chubbies on one page went to the same person.

name: ttagxamm
text: That's right: I'm insidious.

name: jollysaintpete
text: fuckin' a

name: tekende
text:
I got superior oblique myokymia
It hurts so bad, mamma mia

name: dasilodavi
text: It's like The Iceman Cometh.  Roast Beef comes back, but that dream never does come true.  Fortunately they have other dreams, and Onstad isn't a broken shell of a man like Eugene O'Neill.

name: hateandwar
text: Check out the tiny, tiny Ray.

name: swatson
text: a bloo bloo bloo

name: laserblade
text: It's 1:30 AM and your avatar made me LOL.

name: charchar
text: this is why cats can't have martinis: they get all emotional.

name: plasticthings
text: raps about owning property?

name: catgrl131
text: Man, I already know how to shoot out windows !

name: catgrl131
text:
Let me try that again:
Man, I already know how to shoot out windows!

name: swatson
text: "ABLOO BLOO BLOO!"

name: zeromyerz
text: Who else can hear rocketman?
